mapper.select: SELECT board_state boardState, board_no boardNo, title title, writer writer, to_char(board_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') as boardDate, content content, board_img0 boardImg0, board_img1 boardImg1, board_img2 boardImg2, board_img3 boardImg3 FROM ( select rownum as rnum,board_state,board_no,title,board_date,writer,content,board_img0,board_img1,board_img2,board_img3 FROM ( select board_state,board_no,title,board_date,writer,content,board_img0,board_img1,board_img2,board_img3 FROM board WHERE Location='P' ORDER BY board_State,board_No+0 desc)) WHERE rnum BETWEEN ((#{curPage}-1)*10)+1 AND #{curPage}*10
select count(board_No) from board where location='P'

SELECT board_state boardState, board_no boardNo, title title, writer writer, to_char(board_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') as boardDate, content content, board_img0 boardImg0, board_img1 boardImg1, board_img2 boardImg2, board_img3 boardImg3 FROM ( select rownum as rnum,board_state,board_no,title,board_date,writer,content,board_img0,board_img1,board_img2,board_img3 FROM ( select board_state,board_no,title,board_date,writer,content,board_img0,board_img1,board_img2,board_img3 FROM board WHERE Location='P' and board_State=#{boardState} ORDER BY board_State,board_No+0 desc)) WHERE rnum BETWEEN ((#{curPage}-1)*10)+1 AND #{curPage}*10
